comprehensive_overview: pybind11 is a lightweight header-only library that exposes C++ types in Python and vice versa, mainly to create Python bindings for C++ libraries. It provides seamless interoperability between C++11 and Python without the need for boilerplate code or external tools.
core_features: 1. Efficient inter-process communication between C++ and Python. 2. Direct access to C++ data structures and functions in Python. 3. Simplified interface for exposing C++ code to Python by binding native types, functions, and classes. 4. Support for various Python versions including 2.7 and 3.x.
